requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 / i5-3330
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 2gb
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GUTS is not optimized yet

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 2800+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card supporting Pixel Shader 2.0 and 3D graphics
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1GB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+)
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

requirements_en.minimum:
• OS: Windows 7, XP, Vista and 2000
  • Processor: 350MHz
  • Memory: 128MB
  • Hard Drive: 100MB
  • Graphics: DirectX 7 Compatible
  • Sound: DirectX 7 Compatible
  • DirectX®: DirectX 7 or later
